name: UITableViewDataSource
desc: The methods that an object adopts to manage data and provide cells for a table view.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, numberOfRowsInSection: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Tells the data source to return the number of rows in a given section of a table view.

items.name: func numberOfSections(in: UITableView) -> Int
items.desc: Asks the data source to return the number of sections in the table view.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, cellForRowAt: IndexPath) -> UITableViewCell
items.desc: Asks the data source for a cell to insert in a particular location of the table view.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, titleForHeaderInSection: Int) -> String?
items.desc: Asks the data source for the title of the header of the specified section of the table view.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, titleForFooterInSection: Int) -> String?
items.desc: Asks the data source for the title of the footer of the specified section of the table view.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, commit: UITableViewCell.EditingStyle, forRowAt: IndexPath)
items.desc: Asks the data source to commit the insertion or deletion of a specified row in the receiver.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, canEditRowAt: IndexPath) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the data source to verify that the given row is editable.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, canMoveRowAt: IndexPath) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the data source whether a given row can be moved to another location in the table view.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, moveRowAt: IndexPath, to: IndexPath)
items.desc: Tells the data source to move a row at a specific location in the table view to another location.

items.name: func sectionIndexTitles(for: UITableView) -> [String]?
items.desc: Asks the data source to return the titles for the sections of a table view.

items.name: func tableView(UITableView, sectionForSectionIndexTitle: String, at: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Asks the data source to return the index of the section having the given title and section title index.
